mapper.select: SELECT `headwear_id` AS `headwearId`, `headwear_name` AS `headwearName`, `gold_price` AS `goldPrice`, `seq_no` AS `seqNo`, `headwear_status` AS `headwearStatus`, `pic_url` AS `picUrl`, `has_gif_pic` AS `hasGifPic`, `gif_url` AS `gifUrl`, `has_vgg_pic` AS `hasVggPic`, `vgg_url` AS `vggUrl`, `is_time_limit` AS `isTimeLimit`, `effective_time` AS `effectiveTime`, `create_time` AS `createTime`, `allow_purse` AS `allowpurse`, `left_level` AS `leftlevel`, `mark_pic` AS `markPic` FROM `headwear` WHERE `headwear_id` = #{headwearId}
